title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 320.3 - Record retention period
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 320.3 - Record retention period

State Regulations

Every record required to be maintained under this Part
shall be retained for a period of two years after December 31 of the year in
which the transaction to which the record relates has occurred and for such
further period as the commissioner may require for purposes of any
investigation or litigation under the law, by written notice to the person
required to keep such records under this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
320.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
